code: @Test public void testDoCatchDirectRoute() throws Exception {     getMockEndpoint("mock:a").expectedMessageCount(1).     getMockEndpoint("mock:b").expectedMessageCount(1).     getMockEndpoint("mock:c").expectedMessageCount(1).     template.sendBody("direct:start", "Hello World").     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }

@Override public void configure() throws Exception {     from("direct:start").doTry().to("direct:a").doCatch(Exception.class).to("direct:c").end().     from("direct:a").to("mock:a").dynamicRouter(method(DoCatchDirectDynamicRouteTest.class, "next")).     from("direct:b").to("mock:b").throwException(new IllegalArgumentException("Forced")).     from("direct:c").to("mock:c"). }

@Override protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             from("direct:start").doTry().to("direct:a").doCatch(Exception.class).to("direct:c").end().             from("direct:a").to("mock:a").dynamicRouter(method(DoCatchDirectDynamicRouteTest.class, "next")).             from("direct:b").to("mock:b").throwException(new IllegalArgumentException("Forced")).             from("direct:c").to("mock:c").         }     }. }
public String next() {     if (counter++ == 0) {         return "direct:b".     } else {         return null.     } }
